verses.verse: But on the first <S%G1520><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> at early <S%G3722><s%> dawn, <S%G3722><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to the tomb, <S%G3418><s%> bringing <S%G5342><s%> the spices <S%G759><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had prepared. <S%G2090><s%>
And they found <S%G2147><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> rolled <S%G617><s%> away <S%G617><s%> from the tomb, <S%G3419><s%>
but when they entered, <S%G1525><s%> they did not find <S%G2147><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And it happened <S%G1096><s%> that while <S%G1722><s%> they were perplexed <S%G639><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> suddenly stood <S%G2186><s%> near <S%G2186><s%> them in dazzling <S%G797><s%> apparel; <S%G2066><s%>

and as [the women] were terrified <S%G1719><s%> and bowed <S%G2827><s%> their faces <S%G4383><s%> to the ground, <S%G1093><s%> [the men] said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you seek <S%G2212><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> One among <S%G3326><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>?
"He is not here, <S%G5602><s%> but He has risen. <S%G1453><s%> Remember <S%G3403><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> He spoke <S%G2980><s%> to you while He was still <S%G2089><s%> in Galilee, <S%G1056><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be delivered <S%G3860><s%> into the hands <S%G5495><s%> of sinful <S%G268><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> and be crucified, <S%G4717><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%> "
And they remembered <S%G3403><s%> His words, <S%G4487><s%>

and returned <S%G5290><s%> from the tomb <S%G3419><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> to the eleven <S%G1733><s%> and to all <S%G3956><s%> the rest. <S%G3062><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> they were Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> and Joanna <S%G2489><s%> and Mary <S%G3137><s%> the [mother] of James; <S%G2385><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G3062><s%> women <S%G3062><s%> with them were telling <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> to the apostles. <S%G652><s%>
And these <S%G3778><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> to them as nonsense, <S%G3026><s%> and they would not believe <S%G569><s%> them.

[But Peter <S%G4074><s%> arose <S%G450><s%> and ran <S%G5143><s%> to the tomb; <S%G3419><s%> stooping <S%G3879><s%> and looking <S%G3879><s%> in, he saw <S%G991><s%> the linen <S%G3608><s%> wrappings <S%G3608><s%> only; <S%G3441><s%> and he went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> to his home, <S%G848><s%> marveling <S%G2296><s%> at that which had happened. <S%G1096><s%>]

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of them were going <S%G4198><s%> that very <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> to a village <S%G2968><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Emmaus, <S%G1695><s%> which was about seven <S%G1835><s%> miles <S%G4712><s%> from Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

And they were conversing <S%G3656><s%> with each <S%G240><s%> other <S%G240><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> which had taken <S%G4819><s%> place. <S%G4819><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that while <S%G1722><s%> they were conversing <S%G3656><s%> and discussing, <S%G4802><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> approached, <S%G1448><s%> and [began] traveling <S%G4848><s%> with them.
But their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were prevented <S%G2902><s%> from recognizing <S%G1921><s%> Him.

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G5101><s%> are these <S%G3778><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> that you are exchanging <S%G474><s%> with one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> as you are walking <S%G4043><s%>?" And they stood <S%G2476><s%> still, <S%G2476><s%> looking <S%G4659><s%> sad. <S%G4659><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of them, named <S%G3686><s%> Cleopas, <S%G2810><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Are You the only <S%G3441><s%> one <S%G3441><s%> visiting <S%G3939><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> and unaware <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1097><s%> of the things which have happened <S%G1096><s%> here <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> in these <S%G3778><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>?"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G4169><s%> things <S%G4169><s%>?" And they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "The things about <S%G4012><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Nazarene, <S%G3479><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was a prophet <S%G4396><s%> mighty <S%G1415><s%> in deed <S%G2041><s%> and word <S%G3056><s%> in the sight <S%G1727><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%>

and how <S%G3704><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and our rulers <S%G758><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> Him up to the sentence <S%G2917><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> and crucified <S%G4717><s%> Him.

"But we were hoping <S%G1679><s%> that it was He who was going <S%G3195><s%> to redeem <S%G3084><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%> Indeed, <S%G235><s%> besides <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> it is the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> since <S%G575><s%> <S%G3739><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> happened. <S%G1096><s%>

"But also <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> among <S%G1537><s%> us amazed <S%G1839><s%> us. When they were at the tomb <S%G3419><s%> early <S%G3720><s%> in the morning, <S%G3720><s%>

and did not find <S%G2147><s%> His body, <S%G4983><s%> they came, <S%G2064><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> that they had also <S%G2532><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> a vision <S%G3701><s%> of angels, <S%G32><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> that He was alive. <S%G2198><s%>

"And some <S%G5100><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who were with us went <S%G565><s%> to the tomb <S%G3419><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> it just <S%G2531><s%> exactly <S%G3779><s%> as the women <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> had said; <S%G3004><s%> but Him they did not see. <S%G3708><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "O <S%G5599><s%> foolish <S%G453><s%> men <S%G453><s%> and slow <S%G1021><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> to believe <S%G4100><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> that the prophets <S%G4396><s%> have spoken! <S%G2980><s%>
"Was it not necessary <S%G1163><s%> for the Christ <S%G5547><s%> to suffer <S%G3958><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> and to enter <S%G1525><s%> into His glory <S%G1391><s%>?"

And beginning <S%G757><s%> with Moses <S%G3475><s%> and with all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> He explained <S%G1329><s%> to them the things concerning <S%G4012><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> the Scriptures. <S%G1124><s%>

And they approached <S%G1448><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> they were going, <S%G4198><s%> and He acted <S%G4364><s%> as though <S%G4364><s%> He would go <S%G4198><s%> farther. <S%G4206><s%>

And they urged <S%G3849><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Stay <S%G3306><s%> with us, for it is [getting] toward <S%G4314><s%> evening, <S%G2073><s%> and the day <S%G2250><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> nearly <S%G2827><s%> over. <S%G2827><s%>" And He went <S%G1525><s%> in to stay <S%G3306><s%> with them.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when <S%G1722><s%> He had reclined <S%G2625><s%> [at the table] with them, He took <S%G2983><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> and blessed <S%G2127><s%> [it,] and breaking <S%G2806><s%> [it,] He [began] giving <S%G1929><s%> [it] to them.
And their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were opened <S%G1272><s%> and they recognized <S%G1921><s%> Him; and He vanished <S%G855><s%> from their sight. <S%G846><s%>

And they said <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> "Were not our hearts <S%G2588><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> us while <S%G5613><s%> He was speaking <S%G2980><s%> to us on the road, <S%G3598><s%> while <S%G5613><s%> He was explaining <S%G1272><s%> the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> to us?"

And they arose <S%G450><s%> that very <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> and returned <S%G5290><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> gathered <S%G7003><s%> together <S%G7003><s%> the eleven <S%G1733><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> were with them,
saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The Lord <S%G2962><s%> has really <S%G3689><s%> risen, <S%G1453><s%> and has appeared <S%G3708><s%> to Simon. <S%G4613><s%>"

And they [began] to relate <S%G1834><s%> their experiences <S%G3588><s%> on the road <S%G3598><s%> and how <S%G5613><s%> He was recognized <S%G1097><s%> by them in the breaking <S%G2800><s%> of the bread. <S%G740><s%>
And while they were telling <S%G2980><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> He Himself <S%G846><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> in their midst. <S%G3319><s%>
But they were startled <S%G4422><s%> and frightened <S%G1719><s%> and thought <S%G1380><s%> that they were seeing <S%G2334><s%> a spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you troubled, <S%G5015><s%> and why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do doubts <S%G1261><s%> arise <S%G305><s%> in your hearts <S%G2588><s%>?

"See <S%G3708><s%> My hands <S%G5495><s%> and My feet, <S%G4228><s%> that it is I Myself; <S%G846><s%> touch <S%G5584><s%> Me and see, <S%G3708><s%> for a spirit <S%G4151><s%> does not have <S%G2192><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and bones <S%G3747><s%> as you see <S%G2334><s%> that I have. <S%G2192><s%>"
[And when He had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> He showed <S%G1166><s%> them His hands <S%G5495><s%> and His feet. <S%G4228><s%>]

And while they still <S%G2089><s%> could not believe <S%G569><s%> [it] for joy <S%G5479><s%> and were marveling, <S%G2296><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Have <S%G2192><s%> you anything <S%G5100><s%> here <S%G1759><s%> to eat <S%G1034><s%>?"
And they gave <S%G1929><s%> Him a piece <S%G3313><s%> of a broiled <S%G3702><s%> fish; <S%G2486><s%>
and He took <S%G2983><s%> it and ate <S%G2068><s%> [it] before <S%G1799><s%> them.

Now <S%G1161><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "These <S%G3778><s%> are My words <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I spoke <S%G2980><s%> to you while I was still <S%G2089><s%> with you, that all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> which are written <S%G1125><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Me in the Law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> and the Prophets <S%G4396><s%> and the Psalms <S%G5568><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>"
Then <S%G5119><s%> He opened <S%G1272><s%> their minds <S%G3563><s%> to understand <S%G4920><s%> the Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%>

and He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Thus <S%G3779><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> that the Christ <S%G5547><s%> should suffer <S%G3958><s%> and rise <S%G450><s%> again <S%G450><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day; <S%G2250><s%>

and that repentance <S%G3341><s%> for forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%> should be proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> in His name <S%G3686><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the nations, <S%G1484><s%> beginning <S%G757><s%> from Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>
"You are witnesses <S%G3144><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

"And behold, <S%G2400><s%> I am sending <S%G1821><s%> forth <S%G1821><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of My Father <S%G3962><s%> upon you; but you are to stay <S%G2523><s%> in the city <S%G4172><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> you are clothed <S%G1746><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> from on high. <S%G5311><s%>"
And He led <S%G1806><s%> them out as far <S%G2193><s%> as Bethany, <S%G963><s%> and He lifted <S%G1869><s%> up His hands <S%G5495><s%> and blessed <S%G2127><s%> them.
And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that while <S%G1722><s%> He was blessing <S%G2127><s%> them, He parted <S%G1339><s%> from them.
And they returned <S%G5290><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%>
and were continually <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3956><s%> in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> praising <S%G2127><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
